Detailed Description

template<typename T>
class ShortListDataSet< T >

A specialization DataSet for shortlist approach in NNLMs.

This object takes a DataSet as a dictionary of word features, and each getPattern return features of given word index. If the index is greater than short_list_size, it will take unk_word index.
